plot: While on vacation overseas, college freshman Ella Hatto's innocent world is torn apart when she learns her entire family has been murdered. Saved from the same fate by a reformed hitman, Stephen Lucas, Ella enlists his services to help track down those responsible.
title: For the Dogs
plot_es: While on vacation overseas, college freshman Ella Hatto's innocent world is torn apart when she learns her entire family has been murdered. Saved from the same fate by a reformed hitman, Stephen Lucas, Ella enlists his services to help track down those responsible.
